Cards.Heading: how it works
Cards.body-1: Use your phone to take a clear, well lit photo of your product. Natural light near a window works best no fancy camera needed
Cards.body-2: Upload the photo straight to our site. No editing, no setup  just a simple upload, and you're good to go. our AI will handle the rest from here.
Cards.body-3: Shaheen generates a polished background with engaging captions , You can edit it before publishing, so you have full control over the final look

FinalCta.title: You Could've Posted by Now Let's Go
FinalCta.subtitle: Let our AI do the writing while you focus on growing your brand

Faq.Heading: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.Subheading: Still have questions ? We have answers
Faq.A-1: Just sign up for a new account, then upload a photo of your product. Our AI will handle the rest.
Faq.A-2: No, our platform is designed to be easy to use even if you have no prior experience.
Faq.Q-3: How can I edit the content ?
Faq.A-3: After the content is ready, you can edit it before publishing. You have full control.
Faq.Q-4: Can I use it on mobile ?
Faq.A-4: Yes, our platform is mobile-friendly. You can upload photos and edit content from anywhere.
Faq.A-5: Yes, we have a support team ready to help you anytime. You can contact us through the website or by email.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Shaheen AI ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered social media management platform.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
items: Name and email address when you create an account
Profile information and preferences
Social media account credentials (when connecting platforms)
Payment information for premium services

usageInfo.title: 2.2 Usage Information
items: Content you upload, generate, or edit using our AI tools
Posts you schedule or publish through our platform
Analytics and performance data
Device information and usage patterns

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and maintain our AI-powered services
Generate and enhance content using artificial intelligence
Schedule and publish posts to your connected social media accounts
Process payments and manage subscriptions
Improve our services and develop new features
Send important updates and notifications
Provide customer support and respond to inquiries

aiProcessing.title: 4. AI and Content Processing
aiProcessing.intro: Our platform uses artificial intelligence to:
items: Generate and enhance images and content
Analyze your social media performance
Provide personalized recommendations
Optimize posting schedules
aiProcessing.additional: Content you upload or generate may be processed by our AI systems to improve our services. We ensure that all AI processing is conducted securely and in accordance with this privacy policy.

informationSharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
To comply with legal obligations
To protect our rights and prevent fraud
With trusted service providers who assist in operating our platform
With social media platforms when you authorize connections

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Access and review your personal information
Update or correct your information
Delete your account and associated data
Opt-out of marketing communications
Request data portability
Withdraw consent for data processing

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our platform integrates with third-party services such as social media platforms and payment processors. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them.

childrenPrivacy.title: 10. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately.

internationalTransfers.title: 11. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards.

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

ContactUs.title: Let's Talk About Your Project
ContactUs.subtitle: Have questions about Shaheen AI? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
ContactUs.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
ContactUs.subject: Subject
ContactUs.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.

contactInfo.title: Get in Touch
contactInfo.description: Ready to supercharge your brand with AI-powered content creation? We're here to help you get started and answer any questions you might have.

startup.question: How quickly can I get started?
startup.answer: You can start using Shaheen AI immediately after signing up. Our platform is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly.

custom.question: Do you offer custom solutions?
custom.answer: Yes! We offer custom AI solutions for enterprise clients. Contact us to discuss your specific needs.

platforms.question: What social media platforms do you support?
platforms.answer: Currently, we support Instagram with plans to expand to other platforms soon.

CompareTable.title: How does Shaheen compare?
CompareTable.subtitle: See how Shaheen stacks up against traditional digital marketing agencies and global platforms

price.name: Price
price.shaheen: Subscription with competitive prices depending on the plan
price.agencies: High monthly contract cost / project depending on scope of work
price.platforms: Low-cost subscriptions for tools that do not include content production

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: How quickly content can be created and published
speed.shaheen: Create designs and schedule automatically within minutes
speed.agencies: Dependent on team availability and client approvals
speed.platforms: Fast in scheduling; content creation is up to the user

accuracy.name: Accuracy
accuracy.shaheen: High precision and ability to edit outputs by the client if desired
accuracy.agencies: Depends on team experience and internal quality control

credibility.name: Credibility
credibility.shaheen: Instant report dashboards based on platform data
credibility.agencies: Periodic reports following each agency's methodology and available data
credibility.platforms: Official dashboards that are difficult to understand

professionalism.name: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Level of professional service and output quality
professionalism.agencies: Strategic management and human creativity with an account manager
professionalism.platforms: Professional interfaces for content management only

experience.name: Experience
experience.shaheen: Experience integrated into the product for optimal outputs

localMarket.name: Understanding of the local market
localMarket.description: Local market knowledge and cultural understanding
localMarket.shaheen: Built for the Arabic language and local market needs
localMarket.agencies: Varies depending on whether the agency is local or international
localMarket.platforms: General global focus not specialized in the needs of the local market

language.name: Language
language.shaheen: Proper Arabic in texts and ad designs

reliability.name: Reliability
reliability.shaheen: SaaS service with technical support and continuous availability
reliability.agencies: Linked to contracts and staff; may be affected by resources
reliability.platforms: Stable cloud infrastructure with technical support

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service â€“ Shaheen AI Platform

legalDefinition.title: 1. Legal Definition
legalDefinition.content: Shaheen AI Platform ("Shaheen", "Platform", "we", "us" or "ours") is a digital product owned and operated by:
legalDefinition.address: Address: Kingdom of Saudi Arabia â€“ Eastern Region â€“ Dammam City â€“ Al-Mohammadiyah District
legalDefinition.agreement: This document ("Terms of Service" or "Agreement") constitutes a legally binding agreement between the Platform and the User ("User", "Client", "you") regarding your use of our digital services and products. Your access to or use of the services constitutes your complete and unconditional agreement to comply with the provisions of these terms.

platform.title: 1. "Platform":
platform.content: Refers to the Shaheen AI Platform and all its affiliated products, services, software, interfaces, and systems.

user.title: 2. "User":
user.content: Any individual or entity that creates an account or uses Shaheen services in any form.

content.title: 3. "Content":
content.content: Includes all data, texts, images, videos, designs, files, or any other materials entered or produced through the platform.

data.title: 4. "Data":
data.content: Includes personal information, business information, and data resulting from user interactions with the platform.

models.title: 5. "Models":
models.content: AI models owned by Shaheen that are developed or improved using data.

ageRequirement.content: The user must be of legal age to enter into binding contracts (18 years or older).

accurateInfo.content: The user commits to providing accurate, correct, and complete information during registration and maintaining its continuous updates.

accountSuspension.content: Shaheen reserves the right to suspend or cancel any account proven to provide misleading information or use the platform in violation of these terms or local and international laws.

aiTools.content: Shaheen Platform provides AI-powered tools and services for generating visual and written content, managing and scheduling posts, and analyzing performance.

serviceChanges.content: Services may expand or change according to technical and commercial developments without prior notice.

technicalLimitations.content: The user acknowledges that services may contain technical or functional limitations related to the technology used or company policies.

dataConsent.content: The user expressly acknowledges and agrees that all data and content entered or produced through the platform may be used by Shaheen for the purpose of:
purposes: Improving and training the platform's AI models.
Conducting market and technical research and analysis.

dataMerging.content: The platform reserves the right to merge user data with other data (after removing any personally identifiable information where appropriate) to create larger training datasets.

dataSharing.content: Personal data will not be sold to third parties, but may be shared with technical providers or business partners for operational and developmental purposes, in accordance with applicable data protection standards.

platformRights.content: All intellectual property rights related to the platform, including models, codes, designs, interfaces, trademarks, are exclusively owned by Shaheen.

userLicense.content: The user grants Shaheen a global, non-exclusive, and perpetual license to use the entered or produced data and content for the purpose of operating and developing services.

restrictions.content: The user is not entitled to copy, resell, or attempt to disassemble or reverse engineer any part of the platform.

trialPeriod.content: The platform provides a limited-time or usage free trial period, during which the client is enabled to test the services.

noRefunds.content: Once the trial period ends and transitions to a paid plan, the user is not entitled to request any cash refund for any reason.

finalPayments.content: All paid fees are final and non-refundable, whether the service was used or not.

priceChanges.content: The platform has the right to modify subscription prices or offer new plans, provided that users are notified before applying new fees.

lawfulUse.content: The user commits to using the platform only for lawful purposes.

prohibitedContent.content: The user is prohibited from entering or publishing any illegal, offensive, or rights-violating content.

harmfulContent.content: Using the platform to generate harmful content, spam messages, or unethical content or content that violates local and international laws is prohibited.

userResponsibility.content: The user bears full legal responsibility alone for the content resulting from their use of the platform.

asIs.content: The platform is provided "as is" and "as available," without any express or implied warranties regarding performance or results.

noLiability.content: Shaheen bears no responsibility for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages that may arise from use or inability to use the services.

aiAccuracy.content: The user acknowledges that AI results may not be 100% accurate, and bears sole responsibility for reviewing and using those results.

rightToModify.content: The platform reserves the right to modify or update this policy at any time.

notification.content: Users will be notified of substantial modifications via email or notification within the platform.

continuedUse.content: Continued use of the platform after publishing any modification constitutes final and binding acceptance of the changes.

saudiLaw.content: This policy is subject to and interpreted according to the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, without prejudice to international laws applicable to e-commerce.

saudiCourts.content: Saudi courts have exclusive jurisdiction to resolve any dispute arising from this agreement.

severability.content: If any provision of this agreement is found to be invalid, the remaining provisions remain in full force.

entireAgreement.content: This agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the platform and the user, and supersedes any previous agreements or understandings.

noWaiver.content: Any failure by Shaheen to enforce any provision does not constitute a waiver of its rights.

userAcknowledgement.title: ðŸ”’ User Acknowledgement:
userAcknowledgement.content: By using or registering on the Shaheen platform, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this policy and agree to comply with all its provisions without restriction or condition.
